Tony Evers: the Democratic nominee for governor, made the claim that Wisconsin is "49th out of 50 states in infrastructure."
U: S. News & World Report's "2018 Best States" report ranked Wisconsin 26th overall on infrastructure, with rankings of 14th in energy, 41st in internet access, and 34th in transportation.
CNBC: s evaluation of road and bridge quality, commute time, air travel availability, and other factors ranked Wisconsin 23rd in infrastructure for 2018.
